Hero.title: Innovate. Transform. Succeed.
Hero.subtitle: TechFront empowers your business with cutting-edge technology solutions designed for growth and efficiency.

About.title: About TechFront
About.subtitle: We are a passionate team of innovators and problem-solvers dedicated to delivering impactful technology solutions. Our mission is to drive your success through strategic application of the latest advancements.
About.missionText: To empower businesses with transformative technology that fuels growth and innovation.
About.visionText: To be the leading partner for businesses seeking to navigate the complexities of the digital age.
About.valuesText: Innovation, Integrity, Collaboration, and Customer Centricity guide everything we do.

CTA.title: Ready to Elevate Your Business?
CTA.subtitle: Let's discuss how TechFront can tailor solutions to meet your unique challenges and goals.

Footer.companyDescription: Innovative solutions for a digital world. Driving your business forward with technology.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: We're here to help and answer any question you might have. We look forward to hearing from you!
ContactPage.sendMessageDescription: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.addressValue: 123 Innovation Drive, Tech City, TX 75001, USA

ContactForm.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
ContactForm.successDescription: Thank you for contacting us. We'll be in touch soon.
ContactForm.errorMessageDefault: Failed to send message. Please try again.
ContactForm.errorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

MetaGeneratorPage.title: AI Meta Description Generator
MetaGeneratorPage.description: Craft compelling, SEO-friendly meta descriptions for your web pages with the power of AI.
MetaGeneratorPage.formDescription: Provide keywords and page content to generate an optimized meta description.

MetaGeneratorForm.keywordsPlaceholder: e.g., innovative technology, AI solutions, business growth
MetaGeneratorForm.contentPlaceholder: Paste the main content of your web page here...
MetaGeneratorForm.generatedDescription: Copy and use this for your page's SEO settings.
MetaGeneratorForm.successDescriptionToast: Review the generated meta description below.
MetaGeneratorForm.errorToastDefault: Failed to generate meta description. Please try again.
MetaGeneratorForm.errorToastUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
